name: TheBible
0:
”Alexa, open The Bible.”
”Alexa, tell The Bible to give me inspiration.”
”Alexa, ask The Bible to read Luke chapter 2.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the bible
des: The Bible skill will read Bible passages of your choosing, or else select a random, popular scripture for you. The King James version of the Bible is used.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
